basics.summary: I am studying to obtain a B.B.A. in Finance, Management Information Systems, and International Business in the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii at MƒÅnoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2023.

education.area: Finance, Management Information Systems, International Business (expected Spring, 2023)

work.summary: Head of online presence for Ka Leo
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official college newspaper website
Drive, design and build student-community projects for UH Manoa
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk

volunteer.organization: Associated Students of the University of Hawaii
volunteer.summary: Allocating ASUH's stock portfolio and student fees towards student activities
highlights: Facilitated the approval and payment of awards for service to members of the senate
Oversaw an investment portfolio of over $11.3 million managed by Graystone Consulting
Successfully recruited over 50 brothers (75% increase) while fostering an alumni support network
Oversaw elections and bylaws while documenting activities and reporting for university and fraternity reports
Participated in local community service projects: NAMIWalks, Walk to Defeat ALS, and Surfrider
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
